text: Mbega ntimwashikiwe n’inkuru zabamwe bamyeho imbere yanyu, aribo bantu bo kuntumwa y’Imana Nuhu (iii) no kuntumwa y’Imana Aadi (iii) hamwe na Thamuda (iii) hamwe nabamyeho munyuma zabo atanuwubazi atari Imana yonyene gusa, kuko bashikiwe n’intumwa zabo bafise n’ivyemezo biri k’umugaragaro, baca basubiza amaboko yabo hejuru y’iminwa yabo baca babwira izo ntumwa bati:- mu vy’ukuri twebwe turahakanye ivyo mwarungikanywe, kandi mu vy’ukuri twebwe turafise amakenga aducamwo hirya no hino kubera ivyo muduhamagarira
